noticesystem.notice-usage: Usage: !notice [status / add / get / list / remove / edit / toggleid / insert / interval / req / toggle / toggleoffline / toggleshuffle / selectgroup / addgroup / removegroup / renamegroup]
noticesystem.notice-config: Notice Settings - [Selected Group: $1 / Number of Groups: $2 / Notice Toggle: $3 / Interval Min: $4 / Interval Max: $5 / Message Trigger: $6 / Messages in Group: $7 / Say Notice in Offline Chat: $8 / Shuffle Messages: $9]
noticesystem.notice-no-notices: There are no notices in group $1 - Create one with !notice add
noticesystem.notice-get-usage: Usage: !notice get [notice id] - Notice ids in group $1 go from 0 to $2
noticesystem.notice-remove-usage: Usage: !notice remove [notice id] - Notice ids in group $1 go from 0 to $2
noticesystem.notice-edit-usage: Usage: !notice edit (notice id) (message) - Notice ids in group $1 go from 0 to $1
noticesystem.notice-toggleid-usage: Usage: !notice toggleid (notice id) - Toggles the notice at the specified id on/off
noticesystem.notice-add-success: Notice added to group $1 at position $2!
noticesystem.notice-insert-nan: Notice id must be a number
noticesystem.notice-insert-success: Notice inserted into group $2 at position $1!
noticesystem.notice-interval-nan: Notice intervals need to be numbers.
noticesystem.notice-interval-too-small: Notice intervals need to be more then 0.25 minutes.
noticesystem.notice-interval-wrong-order: Minimum interval was be smaller or equal maximum interval.
noticesystem.notice-req-success: Required message(s) between notices of groups $1 set!
noticesystem.notice-req-404: Notice req messages needs to be a number and at least 0.
noticesystem.notice-enabled.offline: Notices in group $1 will now be sent while the stream is offline.
noticesystem.notice-disabled.offline: Notices in group $1 will no longer be sent while the stream is offline.
noticesystem.notice-enabled.shuffle: Notices in group $1 will now be sent in random order.
noticesystem.notice-disabled.shuffle: Notices in group $1 will now be sent in order of their ids.
noticesystem.notice-no-groups: There are no notice groups - Create one with !notice addgroup.
noticesystem.notice-selectgroup-usage: Usage: !notice selectgroup [group id] - Group ids go from 0 to $1.
noticesystem.notice-addgroup-success: Added new group $1 and selected it.
noticesystem.notice-removegroup-usage: Usage: !notice removegroup [group id] - Group ids go from 0 to $1.
noticesystem.notice-removegroup-success: Group $1 was deleted. Currently selected group: $2.
noticesystem.notice-removegroup-success-: Group $1 was deleted. No groups left. Create one with !notice addgroup.
noticesystem.notice-renamegroup-usage: Usage: !notice renamegroup [group id] [name] - Group ids go from 0 to $1.
